website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot SX170 IS delivers a 16x zoom range at a low price, but images are noisy and the camera is a slow performer.

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera Fantastic price, I even got a free 16 gig card with it!!! I use this camera in the field and also for family functions, for the price I paid for it the pictures are wonderful, and the zoom lens is very nice for long distance shots. I have not had the opportunity to use these new cameras with all the functions they now have, but in a short amount of time I was able to learn how to operate every function this camera has. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cousin Vinny

customer_reviews.title: The clarity of this camera is awesome. The pictures are crystal clear and she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughter in law for graduation since she was always using her iphone to take pictures. The clarity of this camera is awesome. The pictures are crystal clear and she loves it. The close up photo's or cropped photo's come our beautifully. I'm looking at purchasing one myself! Would buy again in a second. Easy to use too!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Killeri

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Bag Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am a canon girl, but I refuse to keep my professional camera with me at all times. I was lugging my Rebel around, but even that got to be a pain. This allows me to shoot in manual mode, the flash won't ruin your photos as it doesn't use flash unless you raise the flash up. Has video mode, which is nice to be able to get short clips of videos of my kiddos. I also love that the battery unit is rechargeable. Some complain about this, but I love it. If you need to buy a back up battery, it's not expensive to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been a Canon fan for a very long time. I needed to upgrade my camera when traveling to Peru. I got this for its optical zoom, HD video, and size. It does everything very well, but its still not perfect. It takes awhile to write a picture after you capture it. It also takes decent time to charge the flash. But its a inexpensive camera. And on that point it does everything as expected. I will be keeping it for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: C.  Ciofalo

customer_reviews.title: More Bang for Your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I love Canon! I have an SLR but for quit shots, this is great! Plus the price was excellent. My old quick-snap quit working; I can't live without a camera regardless of phone cameras (they're okay, but don't do everything I want them to do). I found this on Amazon. My first camera was a Canon - my last one will likely be a Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I am a Canon fanatic, however this one left me without kind words. Functions were too sluggish and left noise in shots taken. I was very disappointed in over all functionality of this mode. I had an earlier version and loved it, unfortunately my wife left it on one her business trips and of course was never found. The good thing about this camera, my wife said she would rather use her cell phone. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: John Guider

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Lithium Ion batteries after having to use AA's ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for me. I've taken a lot of photos with it. I really like the Lithium Ion batteries after having to use AA's in my old Canon.I was constantly changing AA's. I bought an extra charger with 2 Li-Ion batteries for this that included a car charger adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: could be a good option for small travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera had some technical issues, kept sending the "error" message and shutting down. Canon website did not provide any feasible way of fixing the matter or working around the "error" message. Had to return the camera. Otherwise, it was small and light, could be a good option for small travel camera.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use mediocre image camera.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use as a mediocre point and shoot. I am a die hard Canon fan and was really looking for something with a little more quality images, then I remembered I only paid $130 for it. Nice to have for quick and easy to use camera when you don't really care about enlarging. I had a Canon 5mp small point and shoot 6-7 years ago that had better image reproduction. For the money not a bad camera for it's intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: mmacc109

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera takes great pictures. Has great battery life. Showed up in a zip loc bag box...lol no but deal I knew it was a used camera
customer_reviews.author: Travis Todd

customer_reviews.title: Greatful
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, i still have it but i do not use it. It did what it needed to do at the time.
customer_reviews.author: SandyMack

customer_reviews.title: ... a simple point and shoot camera that would take good pictures. This certainly does the job
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple point and shoot camera that would take good pictures. This certainly does the job. It takes excellent quality pictures, and though its not as great as some of the DSLRs out there, this is a great option that is way cheaper, still takes great photos, and has the look and feel of a camera far more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the price, takes excellent photos and very easy to use. I had the same camera in red but dropped it and broke the lens, this one was perfect replacement as all my extra batteries, ect. fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Hoover

customer_reviews.title: I'm a happy camper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little point & shoot camera. Takes nice, clear pictures. Convenient and easy to operate. The only thing I didn't like is that the camera was mailed through Ontrac mail service. They are terrible mail service! But luckily, I got the camera and it wasn't damaged. Have been enjoying it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: classy qm

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowershotSX170IS
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this camera because it is very similar to the one I had previously, Cannon Powershot SX110 IS. The only thing I didn't look at is what kind of battery this one had. I think it will be cheaper not having to buy batteries, but think that I would rather buy batteries then worry if the battery for this camera will go dead because I forgot to charge it. Has more photo options then my last camera and it takes great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Standard Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm a YouTuber, and this camera is more than enough to suit my needs. It takes fairly decent photos and video. The video has far less options than photos do. Also, there is no way to attach extra lenses to the camera. It can be a bit grainy at times, but that may be because your ISO is too high. All in all, it's a step up for most cameras and the best for the price it's at.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Duran

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Takes clear sharp photos, macro and zoom. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Ktina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this camera! It takes beautiful photos :) My husband and I are total WWE fans and though we can't afford the best seats in the house, my camera does wonders! The zoom was like if I were sitting on the floor! So I can still take pictures of my favorite wrestlers :) I used to take pictures with my iPhone, but it would eat my battery like nothing else and the zoom was awful! My pictures would turn out blurry and pixelated, but with my Canon it works wonderful :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for it's price range. Photo editing programs will perfect anything that the camera didn't capture, just right.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Parks

customer_reviews.title: great travel camera
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of cameras to take with on trips. I have a full sized cannon rebel but sometimes its just to big to take with to some places. I like the zoom option...nice sized back display area. Takes very nice professional looking photos. Trust the reputation canon has.
customer_reviews.author: momsmit

customer_reviews.title: Canon Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera because of the way it looked and because of the simplicity of use. I love it. It takes great pictures, it really is easy to use, it's lightweight and I would recommend it to anyone who wants a great camera that is inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Eason

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 year old daughter who has just started to show an interest in photography. Perfect starter camera. It does allow for the changing of many manual settings as well as takes video. Extremely happy with this camera. Takes great pictures and love the rechargeable battery option.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I wanted one that takes batteries and this is the one. I'm still learning all the possibilities with this camera. It's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: debbiejo

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot SX170 came with minimum items
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera, and it does have some great features. It is all plastic, and not what I expected as far as quality. It also came as a stripped unit with no memory card. This is most likely due to the promo. I have done a number of shots, and the camera does focus up close, has a quick processing speed and at the price I paid, is acceptable. I would not pay the retail price for what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Part Time Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Canon
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I have a camera that has clarity and no blurred lines when taking pictures. Great shots! Affordable price. I did noticed there was not a cord to export pictures to computer, but the memory card was sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item I had only used it a few times at home but last night went out for the first time. It took great pictures at my sons cadet military ball and I just love the camera period. I am still using the same battery and have not had to charge it yet. When I got the camera the battery had a little charge but I went ahead and gave it a full charge and though I have only taken a few photos the battery has maintained its charge and it's been a few weeks....Well worth it...
customer_reviews.author: Tina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I love, love , love this camera. It takes fabulous pictures, has the most amazing zoom capabilities and is easy to use for someone that is not that camera savy. I would highly recommed this camera if you are looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Crespi

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for when our family goes out hiking ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for when our family goes out hiking and don't want to carry my DSLR Rebel . Lightweight , takes great pictures !
customer_reviews.author: flyone11

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Takes beautiful pics
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Takes beautiful pics. Allows you to easily move from setting to setting.
customer_reviews.author: politicod

customer_reviews.title: It's small and compact but perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Had this exact camera but it was stolen. Tried to find another but they are not being made anymore. It's small and compact but perfect for what I need. The newer models in stores are too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: anthony bodner

customer_reviews.title: My first Camera
customer_reviews.text: I mean, how can you just hate this camera? Is the first camera I have bought by my self, is really good, battery life is like a lot, I mean I've used it like in 10 activities and I've charged it only once, amazing, really good pictures and fast shots, just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: the sx160 is and I absolutely LOVED that camera
customer_reviews.text: My last camera was lost in a house fire, the sx160 is and I absolutely LOVED that camera. I replaced with the 170 because the 160 is out of production. VERY HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Kenneally

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an underperforming pocket camera, this model has some more powerful features than my current handheld camera. Control panel provides easy access to most of the camera's functions.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tallmadge

customer_reviews.title: Need a good camera at a decent price *****
customer_reviews.text: got the cam in black looks like new works great, deffinately recomend if your looking buy this camera, for previou canan owners is best as there is no instruction guide with this purchase, guide is a pdf download if really needed.
customer_reviews.author: Don Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it two days before Christmas for my girlfriend and received it Christmas Eve - Thanks Amazon, you guys ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: The Canon is also sweet. I have a Powershot G9 and G15 and for as cheap as this SX160 is in comparison it is worth it! Excellent zoom and fantastic pics, lightweight and small - Perfect for hiking and backpacking trips.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoran Desert

customer_reviews.title: but was disappointed that not instructions came with this
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift, she uses this all the time, but was disappointed that not instructions came with this. Had to go on line and figure out where to locate them and get them/
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a beginner camera for my son, and it filled the bill for all the necessary photo adjustments he needed in manual and ease in auto mode.
customer_reviews.author: cdee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good Photos, the pixels doesn't break even when viewed on high resolution laptop.
customer_reviews.author: aamir khan

customer_reviews.title: Liked by person I bought it for.. but..
customer_reviews.text: .. it did not come with accessory cords nor the SD card ... yes was a great buy, and said either refurbished or used,, just disappointed to hear lack of cords it came with and no SC card,, but as for being a camera.. works great!
customer_reviews.author: S.  Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. It's small yet has great zoom. I am very please with the photos I have taken with it. The only thing is that it didn't fit into the case that came with the bundle.
customer_reviews.author: JME

customer_reviews.title: A good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Works good for me! I like the shutter speed - much faster than the model I had previously. I'm not a photog, just a 'point and shoot' user but I did get this one for the advanced zoom and that works great.
customer_reviews.author: E. Solch

customer_reviews.title: had finger marks and food on picture viewing screen. ...
customer_reviews.text: had finger marks and food on picture viewing screen. box very worn. had to return bc couldn't give as gift or trust quality of internal condition.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Check out my review on it. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera! Still working great. Check out my video!
customer_reviews.author: MrsGinaTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: camera is ok but almost any phone nowadays has better picture and recording quality than this.
customer_reviews.author: Billy R.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for our teenage daughter. She loves it. It does everything she needs it to do. The one thing I think it lacked is that it did not come with a case. That would be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Anthropy

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this little camera, great buy at the right price. I would not hesitate to purchase from this buyer again. the camera is as it was advertised, actually I would say better than stated. happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: Came with lots of options of which I have to read through them all and see what they do. It's a nice higher end point and shoot and even with my (slightly) shaky hand it delivered very clear video.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganDad

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am no photographer, but my friend needed a head shot for a college audition and it turned out great despite myself. The screen is not great but the image is amazing once printed.
customer_reviews.author: DRDJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice handy little camera. It's easy to point and snap. The different dials can be a bit of a challenge, but, with patience can be managed. Note that an SD card and USB cable are NOT included.
customer_reviews.author: Pam A

customer_reviews.title: love this camera too bad its discontinued for its size ...
customer_reviews.text: love this camera too bad its discontinued for its size takes amazing photos i get get beautiful prints poster size with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: C.Crews

customer_reviews.title: not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: not bad for the price, but the images were not the best. you get what you pay for. Still, it's a canon and with close shots it worked good. Batteries don't last long though.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Louie

customer_reviews.title: First digital for me. Lower end of mid-range cameras ...
customer_reviews.text: First digital for me. Lower end of mid-range cameras and it still has some complexity. Manual only available as a PDF and at135 pages is a lot to learn. Works well as a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH M. CRENSHAW

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the camera bag suggested
customer_reviews.text: I will be honest in that I haven't used this camera yet, but the camera bag they suggest, the Case Logic DCB-302 is toooo small. It's difficult to get it in all of the way and you couldn't carry any extra batteries. I ended up buying a Lowepro Portland 30 and there is plenty of room for camera, chips and extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good if you really need a camera
customer_reviews.text: its ok. Very slow and the quality isn't that great. I take better pictures with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It is the perfect size and the pictures have been clear.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures, just took 900 all over the northwest
customer_reviews.text: Still find it difficult to hold camera away from my eye. Takes great pictures, just took 900 all over the northwest.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best pocket camera I have ever owned. Much better than other cameras I have owned that cost more than twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: pcpurser

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Great pics, price & light...just remember it doesnt come with a case, but nothing a trip to Walmart cant fix
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera !!
customer_reviews.text: It was for my 13 year old grandson and he really loves it and go every where with it, to the New York city and Canada (Niagara Falls) and took beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Fall

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I was searching around to replace my Canon Elph which had the color swap function. While researching I came across the SX170 - I read it's description and functions and saw that it had it. But when I received the camera it wasn't true. UGH!! I really loved the swap function
customer_reviews.author: KMF2678

customer_reviews.title: Only had it a few days and love it. So light
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few days and love it. So light, so easy to use and yet has features to let you be more creative.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne

customer_reviews.title: nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my Canon A1400. This camera seems to be of much higher quality. It takes pictures more rapidly and works like it's supposed to. Well worth the higher cost.
customer_reviews.author: MarcoBinoli

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It is super awesome and I love the features. The first day I got it, I couldn't put it down. Can hardly wait to put this camera into use.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Comparoni

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera 4 stars-I like the zoom and the weight along with great pictures it takes.It's a little complicated but I'm finding my way around how it all works.Good camera!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Camera is Grey Market Item
customer_reviews.text: This is a grey market item. It came with no printed instructions or warranty. On the package, it states: "FOR JAPAN ONLY." Also, the camera itself is adequate for general snapshots, but I found it cumbersome to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Dugger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: AUG 8, 2014- So far, so good. I couldn't wait to get the battery charged, the LCD screen protector on it and the SD card inserted. You need to purchase an SD card if you don't have one BUT I used one of the SD cards I have for my REBEL T3 and it was fine. It's a fun little camera. So far I am impressed and enjoy it! ... I'll post once I get some pic downloaded into the computer. If you are familiar with the Canon family of cameras, set up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaGal

customer_reviews.title: Click and love
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and great pictures. I knew from the moment I took my first picture I was in love. The pictures are clear and crisp. Easy functions to figure out. I wish a quick guide manual was in the box. Negative: it sometimes has a hard time removing red eye.
customer_reviews.author: The May Family

customer_reviews.title: Not the best and over priced for what it does
customer_reviews.text: Not the best and over priced for what it does. Bad model in the powershot line. Stick to the g series
customer_reviews.author: RAWVIBES

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Was a gift for Spousal Unit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Was a gift for Spousal Unit, and she is well pleased. That means I'm well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful photos. Instructions are more involved than other Canon SureShot cameras - harder for non-technical folk.
customer_reviews.author: gr8rytre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: When looking at cameras what I wanted most was Good quality photos (ie at least 16MP so I could crop images with less blur and grain.) Fast shutter speed Compact size This camera meets all my needs, and actually exceeds them. The quality is great, shutter speed is great, and much better than any other camera in its price range (that I've found anyway.) The size is a bonus for me, small, but not typical compact camera size small. I really like the pop up flash, and the fact that you can adjust how bright the flash is. Overall perfect, inexpensive, good quality camera for your everyday needs!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Been using for over a year now to do videos and pics. Love the camera and never had a problem. The 50mm lens is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Moore

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, for this price, small and compact, good quality of pictures, gas flash light , good for starting photographing
customer_reviews.author: Eva I.

customer_reviews.title: This is one great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for it's high 16 pixel and HD video capability and it proved to be versatile and produced excellent pictures. However I still have not figured out how to get the flash to function.
customer_reviews.author: Devananda Day.

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera great for international travels distance and clarity is
customer_reviews.text: amazing camera great for international travels distance and clarity is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Althea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A high-quality camera this one step beyond a simple snapshot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Reichardt

customer_reviews.title: Image quality questionable
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to replace a 10 year old Kodak entry level camera. I thought the image quality would be awesome, its ok. Its possible that a setting was correct. It seems like the camera's shutter speed is too slow. Again it might be an issue with the user but I wasn't wowed like I expected. The optical zoom is great. The image screen is very good. I like the size of the camera as its easy to get a good grip. I have a small canon digital elph that I use but for an older person with a arthritic hands I feel the Sx170 is good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Borstad

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great camera, compact one but with a nice 16x optical zoom, ready to carry on trip, the pics are just fine. The videos are just great and the battery last quite long. It worth buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Alcides

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera, even though i did not receive the "free 16gb" SD Card
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are good so far. I have not really played with it yet because I am borrowing a friends SD card. The products ad said it came with a free 16gb card...did not receive one in the package. Other than that, its been an ok little camera.
customer_reviews.author: The Fett Man

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot SX 170 iS
customer_reviews.text: The best camera of it's kind and class for the money, fun and very easy to use and operate. Would highly recommend the Canon PowerShot to everyone that loves to take pictures on all different subject and terrains. .
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: forensic engineering
customer_reviews.text: The camera was purchased to replace another that ate batteries. Even with flash, I was able to secure many shots, includind close up details of accident scenes and damaged equipment, witthout any loss of power.
customer_reviews.author: bernard harris

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, recommend it to all persons who view this publication
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, recommend it to all persons who view this publication
customer_reviews.author: Pete Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It is happy with the camera, high quality of video and a photo. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ninam69

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in this point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this point and shoot camera. The quality is very poor. There seems to be something wrong with the sensor. Many of my photos have this odd line right down through the picture. Totally kills the picture!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: A Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: My husband was both surprised and pleased when he opened this camera on Christmas Day. Our camera was so out of date we weren't using it any more, and we were letting events pass and babies in the family grow up into teenagers without pictures to record them. I chose the Canon PowerShot because it was recommended by my niece, who is familiar with the different types of cameras available today. Though I am no expert, I can say that my husband got some good pictures this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Mikaelian

customer_reviews.title: "Take It Everywhere!"
customer_reviews.text: I had some doubts when I finally hit the button to purchase this camera. I am so not disappointed. I really love the "look and feel' of it and with the super lens, capturing images at a distance is simply a breeze. Overall? It is Ah...mazing!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: very  satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: easy to handle and ready to go. clear pictures and I can download to my computer for printing. I had to download manual - would have liked it printed in the box instead.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Baublitz

customer_reviews.title: I got my camera and its what I wanted. ...
customer_reviews.text: I got my camera and its what I wanted. However it did not come with a SD card. I wish that the online discription would have pointed this out because I then had to go buy a SD card before I could start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene V Purtee

customer_reviews.title: A very nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very nice camera for the price, everything works as it should. probably the best camera without interchangeable lenses I have ever had. has some trouble taking night shots, esp the stars as the max timing is 15 seconds, so not too good if you like taking long exposure shots.
customer_reviews.author: john crawford

customer_reviews.title: Canon sx 170
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera so far.I have not had a chance to use it much yet.pictures are clear and the zoom works nice
customer_reviews.author: richard aspinwall

customer_reviews.title: Image quality is not what I thought it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Image quality is not what I thought it would be, but I have yet to play around with the settings
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size to carry around in my purse. Takes excellent pictures and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: c. holcomb

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with purchase thank
customer_reviews.text: camera was as described, very pleased with purchase thank you
customer_reviews.author: j Jim-Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Love itr
customer_reviews.text: It its the description precisely. Takes good pictures and has a big screen, love it! Excellent zoom, comes without memory card
customer_reviews.author: Elena Arretche

customer_reviews.title: Nice for this amatuer...
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far... I haven't tried most of the features yet... But it is so nice... And I am certainly having fun with the nice zoom... :)
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Gooseberry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For the Price
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera for the price (I paid $149). My only complaint is that I cannot find a way to lock the automatic focus to infinity. That would be helpful when shooting through a window.
customer_reviews.author: S. Willetts

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've just given it a trial run and it seems to be a very nice camera...I'm satisfied with the picture quality and zoom
customer_reviews.author: paulina

customer_reviews.title: wanted and needed it to be it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I, purchased the Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP digital camera just before going on a cruise last year.... This camera is everything I, wanted and needed it to be it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great! Only thing I have trouble with is the position of the zoom lever͵ my other Canon has the lever on the back and that is more convenient in my opinion. Great picture quality though!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Winston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pic and is easy to use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Aldridge

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera, Black (discontinued by manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Canon 8410B001 PowerShot SX170 IS Black 16MP Camera is a compact point-and-shoot featuring a 16 megapixel 1/2.3" CCD sensor and DIGIC 4 image processor to produce high-resolution, well-detailed stills and HD 720p video. The processor also works to provide reduced noise levels and overall image clarity as well as power throughout the camera to enable a High Speed AF system and intelligent auto shooting modes. The built-in Canon 16x optical zoom lens provides a 35mm-equivalent focal length range of 28-448mm, covering wide-angle to telephoto lengths for shooting in nearly any environment. Intelligent IS image stabilization is also available and features six unique stabilization modes suited to different types of shooting. For image composition, playback, and menu navigation, a 3.0-inch 230k-dot LCD is available and features a wide viewing angle to support use in bright conditions. The SX170 IS also features a refined ergonomic design to increase comfort during use. Package Content: black PowerShot SX170 IS camerabattery pack NB-6LHbattery chargerwrist strapmanualwarranty 16.0 Megapixel sensor, 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor DIGIC 4 Image Processor Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations High Speed AF greatly improves focus speed Large 3.0-inch LCD offers easy viewing even from a wide angle Height 2.80 Width 4.30 Depth 1.70 Weight 0.56 Color Black Operating System Batteries Included Batteries Required Number of Batteries 1 Battery Type Battery Pack NB-6LH Language German, English, French, Dutch, Danish, Ukrainian, Persian, Hindi, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Thai, Arabic, Romanian, Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, K Assembly Required
feature_bullets: Canon's powerful 16x Optical Zoom and 28mm Wide-Angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer helps reduce camera shake so you achieve brilliant images whether you are up close or far away.
16.0 Megapixel sensor and Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor deliver enhanced image quality, Capture impressive 720p HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button and zoom while shooting.
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations to help ensure the best possible image capture for stills or video.

High Speed AF greatly improves focus speed so you can capture every shot with ease, Intelligent IS automatically chooses from six different modes to optimize image stabilization for shake-free images in a wide variety of conditions.
Large 3.0" LCD offers easy viewing even from a wide angle.
